civilopediaText.text: A special guard created to protect the territory of the Dukedom of Nas

name: Auxiliary Cavalry
uniques: Never appears as a Barbarian unit

civilopediaText.text: A light cavalry unit made up of tribes subject to Arxia. Less powerful than standard cavalry, their aim is to scout out and quickly attack enemy positions.

civilopediaText.name: Secret Seekers
uniques: May upgrade to [Composite Bowman] through ruins-like effects

civilopediaText.text: To discover the secrets of all civilizations Rumpleister Zeiwass created this elite group of spies which acted as his eyes and ears, discovering anything in their path.
